title: CEOs speak out about Trump's travel ban
text: "Reservations agents and airport teams have witnessed turmoil in our airports that shows how divisive this order can be," he wrote. "However, it is the current law of the U.S., and so long as that is the case, we must comply. We are doing everything we can to care for any affected customers and team members and treat them with the utmost respect."
summary:
"Reservations agents and airport teams have witnessed turmoil in our airports that shows how divisive this order can be," he wrote.
"However, it is the current law of the U.S., and so long as that is the case, we must comply.
We are doing everything we can to care for any affected customers and team members and treat them with the utmost respect."
